cocktails.name: Mojito
cocktails.instructions: Muddle mint leaves with simple syrup and lime juice. Add rum and ice, top with club soda, and stir gently. Garnish with mint sprig and lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Margarita
cocktails.instructions: Rim glass with salt. Shake tequila, triple sec, and lime juice with ice. Strain into glass over ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Cosmopolitan
cocktails.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lime wheel or twist.

cocktails.name: Virgin Mojito
cocktails.instructions: Muddle lime wedges and mint leaves with simple syrup. Fill glass with ice, add club soda, and stir gently. Garnish with mint sprig and lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Pina Colada
cocktails.instructions: Blend all ingredients with ice until smooth. Pour into a chilled glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a cherry.

cocktails.name: Bloody Mary
cocktails.instructions: Build all ingredients in a highball glass over ice. Stir gently. Garnish with celery stalk and lemon wedge.

cocktails.name: Daiquiri
cocktails.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lime wheel.

cocktails.name: Mai Tai
cocktails.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, except for dark rum. Strain into glass filled with crushed ice. Float dark rum on top. Garnish with mint sprig, lime wheel, and pineapple spear.

cocktails.name: Piña Colada
cocktails.instructions: Blend all ingredients with ice until smooth. Pour into a chilled glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a cherry.

cocktails.name: Mint Julep
cocktails.instructions: Muddle mint leaves with simple syrup in a glass. Fill glass with crushed ice, add bourbon, and stir gently. Garnish with mint sprig.

cocktails.name: White Russian
cocktails.instructions: Build vodka and coffee liqueur over ice in a glass. Float cream on top. Stir gently before drinking.

cocktails.name: Manhattan
cocktails.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with cherry.

cocktails.name: Moscow Mule
cocktails.instructions: Combine vodka and ginger beer in a copper mug filled with ice. Add lime juice and stir gently. Garnish with lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Tequila Sunrise
cocktails.instructions: Pour tequila and orange juice into glass over ice. Slowly pour grenadine down the side of the glass. Garnish with orange slice and cherry.

cocktails.name: Sex on the Beach
cocktails.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with orange slice and cherry.

cocktails.name: Gin and Tonic
cocktails.instructions: Pour gin and tonic water into glass over ice. Stir gently. Garnish with lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Long Island Iced Tea
cocktails.instructions: Shake all ingredients except cola with ice. Strain into glass over ice. Top with cola. Garnish with lemon wedge.

cocktails.name: Mai Tai
cocktails.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, except for dark rum. Strain into glass filled with crushed ice. Float dark rum on top. Garnish with mint sprig, lime wheel, and pineapple spear.

cocktails.name: Mai Tai
cocktails.instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, except for dark rum. Strain into glass filled with crushed ice. Float dark rum on top. Garnish with mint sprig, lime wheel, and pineapple spear.

cocktails.name: Coke
cocktails.instructions: mix the ingredients
